name: places/ChIJ2QuH14lZwokRzfQWCLiCRy8
adrFormatAddress: 1334 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10075-0500, USA

originalText.text:
its a complete scam. I came in for the free offer to try out a new place, and they said I cannot try the botox since I had botox in the last three months.  I wanted to try botox on my chin (10 units) since Ive never had it done there before. Its a scam to get a you in for a consultation. Dont fall for it. Go to Peachy and/or Ever/Body for BETTER and CHEAPER prices. Compare their REVIEWS if you dont believe me.

Read this places Yelp reviews as well.

The owners response is such a complete lie. Ask any doctor or NP.

originalText.text: I absolutely love it here! I can only speak for the Upper East Side location, Iâ€™ve been twice now for Botox and all of the staff are so friendly, they all remembered me when I came in the second time, very welcoming. I originally went here for the free 20 units of Botox promotion, and was a little nervous based on other reviews but I had a wonderful experience, they were not pushy at all and didnâ€™t suggest anything more than what I came in for. I found everyone to be very sweet and accommodating, I actually signed up for their membership program and I donâ€™t even live in NY, (but I visit often), I couldnâ€™t pass it up, itâ€™s an amazing membership program. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: As an expert, I can confidently say that Trish Ashmore is truly one the best injectors in the city. I work in plastic surgery and she is one the only injector I let touch my face, over top plastic surgeons. Iâ€™d rather pay for her to inject me than get it for free at work because I know without a doubt that she will give me the best results. She has the absolute gentlest touch and emphasizes natural-looking results. She has been able to do wonders for me with Botox and I never need any numbing cream! Filler results always look extremely naturalâ€”enhancing my appearance rather than changing it. Her precision and skills are off the charts. Whenever I see Trish, I know that Iâ€™m getting safe and effective treatments with amazing results!
